column4: is the wlan-hardware-switch activated? else check output of "rfkill list"
The light on the button is orange. Always orange.
there you are... its hard blocked. Reboot, try to activate it in BIOS ...
I looked in the BIOS setup already. There is no option there. Pressing the switch button doesn't work either.
i also have a laptop with similar issue. shut down comletely. the start ubuntu and check, if it is still hard locked.
